mapper.delete: delete * from reserve where c_no = #{c_no} and r_no = #{r_no}
mapper.select: select * from review where c_no = #{c_no} order by rv_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into review(rv_no, rv_title, id, rv_date, rv_content, c_no, rate, rv_photo) values(seq_review.nextval, #{rv_title}, #{id}, sysdate, #{rv_content},#{c_no}, #{rate}, #{rv_photo} )
